enhanced_description: Cornerstone is a holistic, AI-powered Talent Experience Platform designed to unlock the limitless potential of your workforce and streamline HR operations. With decades of industry expertise, it serves as a complete end-to-end learning content solution. The platform offers comprehensive capabilities across Learning and Development (including corporate LMS, LXP, training management, adaptive, and personalized learning, with support for extended reality), Recruiting (covering applicant tracking, pre-employment screening, background checks, pre-employment testing, reference checks, recruiting automation, talent acquisition suites, and onboarding), Talent Management (including performance management, career management, employee engagement, employee grievance, HR analytics, and talent insights), Core HR (such as HRIS, HRMS, and HCM), and Total Rewards (including compensation management, payroll services, and benefits administration). It empowers organizations to deliver, manage, and track global training for their workforce, customers, and partners, fosters personalized development for internal mobility, and provides robust talent insights to optimize the organization and develop future leaders, recognizing high performers.
